summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 7%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 921 m), feels like temperature (up 1.9°C), outside temperature (up 1.6°C), and inside temperature (up 1.9°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 572.3m higher than yesterday, 317.5m lower than the past week, 920.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 1838.0m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2160m and 2760m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, a humid atmosphere. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
